website_summaries.verdict: Though they aren't quite as comfortable as Birkenstocks with the classic flat footbeds, these trendy, ultra feminine sandals are still worth considering for ladies who prefer a dressier look.
pros: Stand out for their elevated wedge heel
A fashionable look that is perfect for outfits and occasions that require a more dressy sandal
cons: The arch support doesn't match everyone's foot structure

customer_reviews.title: Concerning purchase
customer_reviews.text: I own several pairs of the Birkenstock Dorothy sandal and was looking forward to getting the white pearl color. All other stores were out of this color, so when I found them on Amazon, I was really excited. They arrived today and I am both concerned and disappointed. These were delivered without a Birkenstock box and with a tag that looked like it was worn or copied. The shoe fits totally differently than the others I own; it is narrower in the straps and seems overall a bit smaller than the ones in my closet, even though they are the very same size. It makes me wonder if these are real Birks or counterfeit? Just saying...
customer_reviews.author: ShopperinTime

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad Birkenstock added some heel to this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Cute and unmonkish. I'm so glad Birkenstock added some heel to this shoe. I have a fallen arch and plantar fasciitis so finding supportive & cute shoes is a struggle. The straps across the top are a little big but the comfort surpasses everything. No pain is so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Hazey1

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY!  Dressy Birks!
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Birkenstocks for 30 years....these are every bit as comfortable as my Arizona's but much cuter with dresses! They are only available in Birkenstock's narrow footbed....which is fine for my feet ....but be aware cannot praise them enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Baker

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I have not had the opportunity to really put my wedges to the test but . . . they are comfortable and offer support, like my many other everyday Birks. These will be stylish with longer flowing skirts and more dressy occasions. I am glad Birkenstock has noted, although we loyal fans, like the traditional style and support, a dressy shoe placed in the line is wise. Most people think Birks are strictly function, but no longer true. They have made a wise marketing move - Wish there were more in leather, since there really is no comparison to leather.
customer_reviews.author: sharon collins

customer_reviews.title: The best part is the wedge heel and the superior arch ...
customer_reviews.text: The leather is lined and soft. The straps are of course adjustable for a custom fit. The best part is the wedge heel and the superior arch support of the design. The leather has a pearlescent quality and they are more attractive than ordinary shoes from this manufacturer. I took them out of the box,made adjustments and wore them for 8 hours and was comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: dvzydeco

customer_reviews.title: Less Crunchy Birks
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable enough to wear daily but not comfortable enough to walk a mile in. The wedge makes them a bit more feminine and a bit less likely to make folks assume I rub a salt crystal in my armpits and pretend it's deodorant.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: I like these sandals because of the slight lift to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like these sandals because of the slight lift to the heel which makes them feel dressier than the usual Birkenstocks. Of course, they are not the usual Birkenstocks; they are Papadilios, which are Birkenstocks with more flair. Since they don't come in half sizes, I ordered a full size (9), which is a half size down from my regular size of 9.5. They are still comfortable, but my heel goes right to the edge. They flatter my feet. I bought a pair for my daughter, too, and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Royal

customer_reviews.title: Cork falling apart after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved them until now. For this price, they should hold up longer than 2 months! They are falling apart already! I was so excited getting them and thinking they would last. This is crazy. The cork is falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Well, I'm in love. These are so comfortable. The height and thinner straps give them a surprisingly classy look in person -- can easily wear these to work, or with jeans, and walk around all day and feel fine. I got my usual Birkenstock size, 38, and they fit just like my other (flat) Birks. I'm almost always a 7.5 in sandals and dress shoes, for reference.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality and bad customer service from Birkenstock!
customer_reviews.text: In less than two months the heels wore down into the fake cork! The soles are very poor quality and I have to replace them for better quality soles costing $40. Birkenstock customer service rep. admitted they shouldn’t have worn that quickly but refused to help in any way and instead insisted it was Amazon who needed to resolve my problem. Amazon customer service is always wonderful and have taken care of my problem. I would not buy these sandals again, not the same as original Birkenstock sandals. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: IMR

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not for me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these to work in the worst way because they are very cute! But I had to return them because they just weren't stable enough for me. I felt like I was going to roll my ankle with each step. I think because of the arch support it pushed my foot more toward the outside and with the base being so narrow, they felt very unstable.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda S.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself was nice. Runs big. I ordered a size smaller then my usual & the fit worked. Although, the box they decided to send my shoes in was HORRIBLE! It was smashed in the corners, the lid was ripped from one end to almost the other end (hanging on by like an inch!), the paper wrapped around the shoes was crinkled up! Why?! Just why would a seller want to forward one of their items like that? Must not know anything about first impressions? I saw the box & totally worried about the inside! Geez!! I was so excited when I ordered them & that went away as soon as I saw the box!
customer_reviews.author: 3girlies

customer_reviews.title: Just like Birkenstocks but with a heel
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are absolutely perfect. I wanted a pair of shoes as comfortable as birkenstocks but with a little heel. Bingo! The only issue I have is that the heel of the right shoe is wearing down big-time. I don't think this is because of the quality or material but rather caused by me. In terms of fit, I have very wide feet and when the shoes arrived I had to loosen the straps but they fit great. I definitely recommend these shoes and will probably buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Dressy Birk- But They Need Some Work!
customer_reviews.text: My feet are ALWAYS in Birkenstock and my family is always complaining that “those are NOT dress shoes” so finding these made me scream aloud. However, these are still not broken in. They are cute, dressier than my Gizeh’s, but I feel as if they fit tighter than any Birkie I’ve ever owned. I’ve had them a year and have worn them maybe six times. At this rate, they’ll be broken in in about 2030.
customer_reviews.author: J. V. Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Am so disappointed was looking for a cute shoe I could wear
customer_reviews.text: The list showed the shoe came in a medium width. I ordered them because of this. Needless to say they only come in narrow. I have RA and my feet swell a lot. Am so disappointed was looking for a cute shoe I could wear. I have never been disappointed by birkenstocks, make sure the drop down choices are correct. What a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: DJGanson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable dressy sandal
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sandals to wear to a wedding because I have flat feet and have never been able to find a dress shoe that is comfortable. I wear Birkenstocks all the time and never knew that they made a dressy sandal. These were perfect. They were dressy enough to wear to the wedding and were extremely comfortable. They're also great to wear with a pair of jeans. I absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: No one

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: I have high arches so I got the slim. Be sure to check for width. Very cute even for a Birkenstock. These are my new dress sandals. I’m 66 with foot issues so I wear Birkenstock’s and Hoka running shoes for long walks or standing for long periods. I had to walk further than I wanted the first time I wore them so a little toe redness.
customer_reviews.author: javelyn

customer_reviews.title: These have lumps and bumps in the footbed. Thinking ...
customer_reviews.text: These have lumps and bumps in the footbed. Thinking that they might even out as I wore them, I wore them. And the lumps and bumbs never went away and HURT my feet (the arch, oy, and the place where the balls of my feet hit -- too thin for me). And they were pricey. And now I can't return them. Adventures in shopping!
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes. It's not easy walking/standing on rough terrain for several hours for a wedding ... but in these shoes I was not uncomfortable. They didn't pinch my toes, as most dress shoes do, and they have a wonderful arch support!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Gerbode

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable to walk but it’s cute looking.
customer_reviews.text: I gave 3 stars because it’s nice looking sandals. It’s nice arch support but what I don’t like about it is not comfortable to walk. It’s hurting my heels to walk because it’s hard as a rock. You can’t ware and walk around grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Calla M.

customer_reviews.title: Returned it.
customer_reviews.text: It looked like a refurbished product. The sole felt like a knockoff, and the cork platform has a heavy glue coating that didn't made it look long lasting. That said, these shoes are gorgeous for what they are and extremely comfortable. I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Ihara Dutra

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Dont get me wrong I love these sandals but I thought they would hold up better and longer. I purchased my sandals in February of this year (2019) and a month or so ago I noticed the cork beside the leather strap is tearing apart. Anyone else experiencing this with these sandals? For the price I really thought they would have lasted longer. Would love to hear feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J Davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I have work Birkenstock sandals for years and ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I have work Birkenstock sandals for years and love them, and always wished they had a nicer looking one available. Due to foot problems recently, I have only been able to wear my Birkenstocks or tennis shoes with inserts, and now I can finally wear something a little more appropriate to the summer season and less "orthopedic" looking. Obviously, the fit is a bit more narrow and different due to the wedge heel, but still has the same great support that allows me to wear them comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: They’re Birks!!! With heals!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a dozen pairs of Birks- sandals, shoes and boots. Now I have heals!! Very comfortable right out of the box. Only wish is that I could get them in leather or suede
customer_reviews.author: GrizzzaBellla

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals. I was able to adjust the straps for a perfect fit. They’re very comfortable. I usually don’t buy narrow shoes but these fit well!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn S

customer_reviews.title: Give time to break in. Wear a few hrs at first.
customer_reviews.text: It is just fine except I should have given myself time to break on. My leg muscles where very sore for a few days because I rote them l day. I am also 59 yrs old and have not worn these heels before.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a slipper!
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted to try a pair of Birks but didn't really like the way the flat styles looked on my wide feet. This Dorothy style solves the problem with its fashionable little wedge. And SOOOO comfortable. I want to wear them around the house like slippers. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Angie D.

customer_reviews.title: A good sturdy base that distributes weight over the arch
customer_reviews.text: A good sturdy base that distributes weight over the arch. Since it is a suede base it does rub a little. Hopefully my foot will toughen up a bit. They also run long. I wear a nine and thought I ordered a 39. See pic
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: This is the first "high heel" birkenstock I have ever seen or tried. They feel great! I'll be looking for other birkenstock brand heels.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent quality
customer_reviews.text: The buckle on the front strap of one of the shoes is defective, it won’t stay closed. This is after 2 wears. I had bought several other colors of the same style which didn’t have this problem, had kept this licorice pair in the box past the return deadline. Now they aren’t wearable, my loss I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Technochic

customer_reviews.title: Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals. They are dressy enough to wear out to a nice occasion. Very comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S Reuss

customer_reviews.title: Almost the right shoe
customer_reviews.text: As much as I liked these, I was disappointed to realize that sole under the ball of my foot is just too thin and I can feel the ground, how hard it is. I'd need more cushioning there. Otherwise this is a very nice looking shoe considering the good arch support. Usually you get comfortable shoes or stylish shoes. These could be both if only the rubber part was just a bit softer or maybe slightly thicker cork footbed. Also, I'd enjoy these in genuine leather, not man made material upper.
customer_reviews.author: Guess Who

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love it - sooooo comfy and the wedge makes it more fashionable. People always comment !
customer_reviews.author: ainjibi

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for great price
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of these shoes. So comfortable and lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as cute as the picture
customer_reviews.text: These looked so cute in the picture and terribly ugly on my feet. Didn't feel steady in them either. Sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi B

customer_reviews.title: CuteI have worn Birkenstocks for 35 years and finally I found some that she will wear.
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my wife who has never worn Birkenstocks before. She loves them, and the heel makes them look a little more dressy. I have worn Birkenstocks for 35 years and finally I found some that she will wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable good looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe saved me!!! Helped me heal my heel pain problems. I like that it is attractive as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marti Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: The narrow in this shoe is a regular medium. I already knew this when purchasing. Very comfortable and looks stylish. I’m between an 8 1/2 and 9. The 40 narrow fits perfectly. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Doe

customer_reviews.title: These are narrower but still fit good. I usually don't wear much heal
customer_reviews.text: These are narrower but still fit good. I usually don't wear much heal, even though I need it, so I thought I would try these. I wore them for a wedding and they were comfortable all day!!! Glad I tried them.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstock sandals
customer_reviews.text: I wish they would also come in a regular width
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty amazing. Was not sure how I would like these but they are just as comfortable as my flat Birkenstocks.
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware...Paid for new, got used.
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes, however, they were not listed as ‘used’ and they had most definitely been worn. While I’m all for reducing, reusing and recycling, I’m also for truth in advertising. We paid new shoe price for used shoes. We will not be buying from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: jskpswm

customer_reviews.title: The size for fine. However the straps were tight
customer_reviews.text: The size for fine. However the straps were tight. I had to loosen them as far as I could. They aren't comfortable if you have to stand for a long time. My flat informatics are so comfortable. So far they haven't broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah James

customer_reviews.title: Good company to deal with
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get a Birkenstock with a wedge. This is very comfortable. I had to call exchange size because first was too big so for me not true to fit but the company was great and no problem with exchange
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly and is dressier than the flat birkies! I really, really liked them. I got the bronze color.
customer_reviews.author: hatlady

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and has a great arch support. Very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: christy Ferentinos

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!  Can wear them all day and walk miles and miles with ease.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Very cute, and extremely comfortable. I sometimes walk 5-6 miles at work and these keep me going all day! Have them in two colors, will probably buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Runs narrow, very good support
customer_reviews.text: Loved that it’s a little narrow as I always have trouble getting shoes to fit my narrow feet
customer_reviews.author: SCL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: First non-flat shoes in easily 15 years & they dont hurt. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R Kurzenberger

customer_reviews.title: I ordered my normal size and they are great. I wish I had known about these sooner ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a long time Birkenstock wearer. I ordered my normal size and they are great. I wish I had known about these sooner they work great with casual office wear.
customer_reviews.author: FUTHARK235

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: These fit as expected. Birkenstock has made another shoe that I absolutely love. I was worried a little about the color, but they were super cute with springtime nail colors.
customer_reviews.author: April Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Size does matter
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 6. I ordered a 37, this was far too big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Will be buying another pair when other colors will be available
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Romero

customer_reviews.title: So Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for a nicer look during the warmer months. They look nice with my light suits.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: I think the 36 runs small.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! But the 38 was too big & the 36 was too small. So bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Wear all day and night
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these shoes. Super comfy. I can wear them all day. I ordered my regular size and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Vimo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe fits well. Great quality very comfy needed no breaking in. I would purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: True to color. Love this style. Sole is firm but to be expected with with brand.
customer_reviews.author: SJP

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, very comfortable and held up all summer long still looking as good as new!
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable wedge
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes if you are looking for a more comfortable and casual wedge. I’m really enjoying them so far!
customer_reviews.author: CriticalThinker

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are light and comfortable. Are casual for jeans, skirts and casual dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: that’s why Birkenstock is one of my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and these sandals fit perfectly...that’s why Birkenstock is one of my favorite brands
customer_reviews.author: Debra Couchman

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ordered open footprint but received filled in. Narrow instead of wide.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Really like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Really like these shoes...happy to finally find a comfy shoe in a wedge. Covers my bunions too. Would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Dressy or casual these fit the bill.
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and look quite dressy. Fit good and not to high.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn V.

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is so comfortable! I love it and thinking about buying another ...
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is so comfortable ! I love it and thinking about buying another pair in black
customer_reviews.author: Shirley J. Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I'm on my feet all day and these shoes are great.
customer_reviews.author: Rena Einum

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The workmanship was excellent. I personally did not like the style.
customer_reviews.author: J  Bragg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great foot support. Got them a couple months ago and still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was so pleased with the service
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased with the service, the price and of course, the quality of my always favorite--Birkenstock sandals. I will continue to look on Amazon for those special items that I want and/or need.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purchase! Packaged arrived sooner then expected, and my shoes were exactly as described!
customer_reviews.author: Sheida Nanton

customer_reviews.title: A little dressier
customer_reviews.text: So use to the original birkenstocks; a good change but with the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my new shoes, they give me good support for my arch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love them! A lot of money but definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Ckark

customer_reviews.title: but expect them to be comfortable. Nice color
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and fit well. I haven't worn them for a whole day yet, but expect them to be comfortable. Nice color.
customer_reviews.author: SMeunier

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTE MUST HAVE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always worn Birkenstocks but never felt comfortable wearing to work. But now with this style I wear them to work all the time. I have two colors and these are the best shoes ever. If you live and love Birks...ladies you need these shoes. I could walk a marathon in these shoes and my plantar faciatis never acts up. RUN dont walk to buy these shoes!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kristi knox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and really like the look and feel of them
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: They are way to small pretty uncomfortable and feel cheap. I bout a pair at Walmart for 14.99 that look 100 times better than these and also fit better
customer_reviews.author: love2read

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes and even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Not only do I love the sandals (they fit perfectly and I'm usually an 8.5), the customer service of FEETHEART was awesome! They contacted me after I ordered them (the same day), saying they were upgrading my order to Priority Shipping. Wow! So nice and so unexpected. I received them in less than two days. Thank you FEETHEART.....Your service is greatly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Birkenstock Women's Dorothy Sandal
product_meta.description: With a trendy wedge heel that visually lengthens the legs, the Dorothy is a truly versatile shoe that can be worn to a variety of occasions
feature_bullets: Birko-Flor is made of easy-to-care-for and hygienic PVC
This high-quality material is very gentle on the skin,
The open-pored and thus very breathable surface makes for a comfortable foot climate,
This natural product is insulating and offers very good cushioning.
